title: Problem with font styles
content:
Hallo there, I have a few questions for you.   
  
I am using FontLab 4.6 OSX 10.2.8.   
  
I was trying to export whatever font suitcase containing regular, italic, bold and bold italic styles. But it somehow seems to be impossible for me to export any suitcase in the way the font families would apear in a row as 1. regular, 2. italic, 3. bold and 4. bold italic. It always apears in a wrong order. I tried to rename them in a varisous ways and even manualy set the "weight" but it didn
author: radek_s
